name: Adam Pierce
learned: I am a barista at Starbucks, where I enjoy crafting new coffee recipes. In my free time, I love hiking and photography.
currently: I want to create a new signature drink for Starbucks.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00
